languages.text: "Бедняга Гапрак. Он мне еще лет десять назад говорил, что ему не по себе в присутствии достопочтимых жестяных братьев. Осторожно так сетовал, что ему не досталась нормальная планета. Надо будет почтить его память молебном... когда закончим с зачисткой". {n}Абеляр выразительно поводит оружием.{/n} "Благо господин Фабрикатор-Цензор сам, без принуждения, признался в измене".

"Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."
languages.original_text: "Бедняга Гапрак. Он мне еще лет десять назад говорил, что ему не по себе в присутствии достопочтимых жестяных братьев. Осторожно так сетовал, что ему не досталась нормальная планета. Надо будет почтить его память молебном... когда закончим с зачисткой". {n}Абеляр выразительно поводит оружием.{/n} "Благо господин Фабрикатор-Цензор сам, без принуждения, признался в измене".

traits.locale_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the esteemed tin brothers. Gingerly complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honor his memory with a prayer... once we're done with the cleanup." {n}Abelard waves his weapon expressively.{/n} "Thankfully, Master Fabricator here didn't require any coercion to confess to treason."

"Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the esteemed tin brothers. Gingerly complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honor his memory with a prayer... once we're done with the cleanup." {n}Abelard waves his weapon expressively.{/n} "Thankfully, Master Fabricator here didn't require any coercion to confess to treason."

"Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the esteemed tin brothers. Casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we've finished sanitizing." {n}Abelard waves his weapon expressively.{/n} "Thankfully, Master Fabricator here didn't require any coercion to confess to treason."

"Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the esteemed tin brothers. Casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we've finished sanitizing." {n}Abelard waves his weapon expressively.{/n} "Thankfully, Master Fabricator here didn't require any coercion to confess to treason."

"Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

"Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

languages.text: “可怜的老贾帕克。大概十年前左右，他告诉我，说他在那群破铁皮人面前感到不安——噢，我是说，那些受人尊敬的机械修会成员。他当时还随口抱怨了几句，说他从来就没管理过正常的行星。看来我只能通过祈祷来悼念他了……等我们净化这个地方之后。”{n}阿贝拉德挥舞着武器。{/n}“幸好，我们不需要对这里的铸造审查师进行审讯，就可以确认他的叛国行为。”
languages.original_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

traits.locale_text: “可怜的老贾帕克。大概十年前左右，他告诉我，说他在那群破铁皮人面前感到不安——噢，我是说，那些受人尊敬的机械修会成员。他当时还随口抱怨了几句，说他从来就没管理过正常的行星。看来我只能通过祈祷来悼念他了……等我们净化这个地方之后。”{n}阿贝拉德挥舞着武器。{/n}“幸好，我们不需要对这里的铸造审查师进行审讯，就可以确认他的叛国行为。”

languages.text: «Pobre Gaprak. Hace diez años o así me comentó que no se sentía tranquilo en compañía de estos cubos de tuercas, digo del inestimable Adeptus Mechanicus. Se quejó de que no le hubiera sido asignado un planeta más normal. Tendré que honrar su recuerdo con una plegaria... cuando terminemos de purgar el lugar». {n}Abelard prepara su arma.{/n} «Por suerte, no ha sido necesario persuadir al fabricator-censor para que confesara su traición».
languages.original_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

traits.locale_text: «Pobre Gaprak. Hace diez años o así me comentó que no se sentía tranquilo en compañía de estos cubos de tuercas, digo del inestimable Adeptus Mechanicus. Se quejó de que no le hubiera sido asignado un planeta más normal. Tendré que honrar su recuerdo con una plegaria... cuando terminemos de purgar el lugar». {n}Abelard prepara su arma.{/n} «Por suerte, no ha sido necesario persuadir al fabricator-censor para que confesara su traición».

languages.text: 「哀れなギャプラック殿。十数年前、彼はブリキ缶の同志…もとい尊敬する帝国技術局の前で、我に不安だと漏らしていました。普通の惑星を与えられなかったと意図なく愚痴をこぼしていたのです。祈りで彼の記憶を讃えなければ…まずはこの場所の浄化が先ですね」{n}アベラルドは武器を構える。{/n}「あのファブリケーター・センサー相手に、反逆罪の自白を強要する必要がなかったのは助かりました」
languages.original_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

traits.locale_text: 「哀れなギャプラック殿。十数年前、彼はブリキ缶の同志…もとい尊敬する帝国技術局の前で、我に不安だと漏らしていました。普通の惑星を与えられなかったと意図なく愚痴をこぼしていたのです。祈りで彼の記憶を讃えなければ…まずはこの場所の浄化が先ですね」{n}アベラルドは武器を構える。{/n}「あのファブリケーター・センサー相手に、反逆罪の自白を強要する必要がなかったのは助かりました」

languages.text: "Armer alter Gaprak. Vor zehn Jahren oder so sagte er mir, er fühle sich in der Gesellschaft der Blechdosen-Kameraden unwohl – will sagen, des geschätzten Adeptus Mechanicus. Er hat sich beschwert, dass ihm kein normaler Planet zugewiesen wurde. Ich muss das Andenken an ihn mit einem Gebet ehren ... sobald wir diesen Ort gereinigt haben." {n}Abelard schwingt seine Waffe.{/n} "Zum Glück bedurfte es keinerlei Zwang, um den Fabricator-Zensor hier zum Geständnis seines Verrats zu bewegen."
languages.original_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

traits.locale_text: "Armer alter Gaprak. Vor zehn Jahren oder so sagte er mir, er fühle sich in der Gesellschaft der Blechdosen-Kameraden unwohl – will sagen, des geschätzten Adeptus Mechanicus. Er hat sich beschwert, dass ihm kein normaler Planet zugewiesen wurde. Ich muss das Andenken an ihn mit einem Gebet ehren ... sobald wir diesen Ort gereinigt haben." {n}Abelard schwingt seine Waffe.{/n} "Zum Glück bedurfte es keinerlei Zwang, um den Fabricator-Zensor hier zum Geständnis seines Verrats zu bewegen."

languages.text: « Pauvre vieux Gaprak. Il m'a confié il y a une dizaine d'années qu'il ne se sentait pas à l'aise en présence de nos camarades en fer-blanc... pardon, des estimés membres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Il se plaignait volontiers de ne pas avoir été affecté à une planète normale. J'honorerai sa mémoire par une prière... quand nous aurons fini de purger cet endroit. » {n}Abélard brandit son arme.{/n} « Fort heureusement, nous n'avons pas eu besoin de forcer le fabricator-censeur à confesser sa trahison. »
languages.original_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

traits.locale_text: « Pauvre vieux Gaprak. Il m'a confié il y a une dizaine d'années qu'il ne se sentait pas à l'aise en présence de nos camarades en fer-blanc... pardon, des estimés membres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. Il se plaignait volontiers de ne pas avoir été affecté à une planète normale. J'honorerai sa mémoire par une prière... quand nous aurons fini de purger cet endroit. » {n}Abélard brandit son arme.{/n} « Fort heureusement, nous n'avons pas eu besoin de forcer le fabricator-censeur à confesser sa trahison. »

languages.text: "Zavallı ihtiyar Gaprak... On yıl kadar önce teneke yoldaşların, yani saygıdeğer Adeptus Mechanicus'un, kendisinin huzurunda huzursuz hissettiğini anlatmıştı. Normal bir gezegene tayin edilmediğinden yakınıyordu. Burayı tümüyle temizledikten sonra... Anısını bir dua ile onurlandırmam gerekecek." {n}Abelard silahını çıkarıyor.{/n} "Neyse ki Denetçi Fabrikatör, ihanetini itiraf etmek için herhangi bir baskıya lüzum duymadı."
languages.original_text: "Poor old Gaprak. Ten or so years back, he told me he felt uneasy in the presence of the tin-can comrades — I mean, the esteemed Adeptus Mechanicus. He casually complained about not having been dealt a normal planet. I'll have to honour his memory with a prayer... once we have finished purging this place." {n}Abelard brandishes his weapon.{/n} "Thankfully, the Fabricator-Censor here did not require any coercion to confess to treason."

Normal bir gezegene tayin edilmediğinden yakınıyordu. Burayı tümüyle temizledikten sonra... Anısını bir dua ile onurlandırmam gerekecek." {n}Abelard silahını çıkarıyor.{/n} "Neyse ki Denetçi Fabrikatör ihanetini itiraf etmek için herhangi bir baskıya lüzum duymadı."
